The American blockbuster stars David Harbour and Bill Pullman are to share the stage in London this summer for the world premiere of a family drama by Theresa Rebeck.

articles.author: Shawn Cohen, Alan Butterfield
articles.title: William Hurt's final days were spent in excruciating pain as he refused to take pain-killing opiates - Daily Mail
articles.description: A close friend tells DailyMail.com the Oscar-winner, who died on March 13, aged 71, only agreed to hospice care in his final days when the pain got too much to bear.
articles.content:
Actor William Hurt spent his last few weeks in excruciating pain as he refused to take opiates and break his decades-long sobriety, a source close to the Oscar-winning actor has revealed.
He only ev… [+8292 chars]
